name: Leoney Resort

reviews.text: Trying to find a good place to stay in any part of Goa proved difficult over the internet, but we finally found Leoney Resort in Small Vagator and were impressed with the website and prompt email replies, so booked.
reviews.title: Great resort in Small Vagator

description: Leoney Resort is an enchanting mix of mock Portuguese villas and cottages set amidst beautifully landscaped gardens and a sparkling blue swimming pool. Just a few minutes stroll from the resort will lead you to one of the most interesting and picturesque beaches in Goa - the Ozran beach. Here, you can be yourself with only the sun and silvery sands for company
